summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.description: I lead technical teams in high-impact projects, from government platforms (CDMX Prosecutor's Office, SEDATU) to open source tools (INSTRUMENT). My experience spans system architecture, UX design, and mentoring in science and technology hackathons (HAWC, LABIC).
